MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH2 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:39pm due to safety concerns with our underground cable network on George Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:43pm on Saturday, 06 March 2021
